scripts.text:
TRUNCATE TABLE stg.movies_metadata
TRUNCATE TABLE stg.ratings
TRUNCATE TABLE stg.credits

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as Pipeline_Name,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as Run_ID,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.billingReference.billableDuration[0].meterType}' as Meter_Type,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.billingReference.billableDuration[0].duration}' as Duration,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.billingReference.billableDuration[0].unit}' as Unit,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.filesRead}' as Number_Of_Processed_Files,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.rowsRead}' as Number_Of_Read_Rows,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.rowsCopied}' as Number_Of_Copied_Rows,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.usedDataIntegrationUnits}' as DIU,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.usedParallelCopies}' as Parallel_Copies,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as Start_Time,
'@{utcnow()}' as End_Time,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as Status,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as Queue_Duration,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as Transfer_Duration,
'@{activity('CopyDataToDB').output.copyDuration}' as Copy_Duration
